name: Ciprofloxacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications: ciprofloxacin tablets administered orally described appropriate guidelines tables .
warningsAndPrecautions: ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 250 mg available round , white film-coated tablets debossed “ y101 ” one side . ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 250 mg available ; bottles 6 tablets ndc 68788-8875-6 bottles 10 tablets ndc 68788-8875-10 bottles 14 tablets ndc 68788-8875-14 bottles 20 tablets ndc 68788-8875-20 bottles 30 tablets ndc 68788-8875-30 bottles 40 tablets ndc 68788-8875-40 bottles 60 tablets ndc 68788-8875-60 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . preserve well-closed container .
contraindications_original: Ciprofloxacin tablets should be administered orally as described in the appropriate Dosage Guidelines tables.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 250 mg are available as round, white film-coated tablets debossed with “Y101” on one side.
                  Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 250 mg are available in;
                  Bottles of 6  Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-6
                  
                  Bottles of 10 Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-10
                  
                  Bottles of 14 Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-14
                  
                  Bottles of 20 Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-20
                  
                  Bottles of 30 Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-30
                  
                  Bottles of 40 Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-40
                  
                  Bottles of 60 Tablets	NDC 68788-8875-60
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Preserve in well-closed container.
